name: Bruiser
description: When Bruisers perform a Basic ATK, thereâ€™s a 20% chance that their next Basic ATK will launch faster with 165% DMG. The enhanced Basic ATKs have a chance to launch an extra one.

name: Support
description: 5s after the battle begins, all allies gain 600 Shield.

name: Defender
description: All allies gain 6 Hybrid DEF. Defenders gain extra 20 Hybrid DEF, with this bonus doubled in the first 20s.

name: Dauntless
description: All allies gain 5% Shield. Dauntless Heroes gain extra 25% Shield.

name: Weapon Master
description: All allies gain 5% Hybrid Lifesteal. Weapon Masters gain extra 10% Hybrid Lifesteal and extra 50% Physical ATK when their HP drops below 70%.

name: Swordsman
description: All allies gain 6% Hybrid ATK. Swordsmen gain extra 5% Hybrid ATK each time they deal DMG, stacking up to 8 time(s).

name: Marksman
description: All allies gain 5% ATK Speed. Marksmen's Basic ATKs reduce target's Physical DEF by 6, up to 6 stacks.

name: Summoner
description: When battle starts, gain a random Summoner. (This may include 3-Star Summoners you've already upgraded.)

4.1: Increase the chance of acquiring high-cost Heroes, and grant 3 Gold.

name: Stargazer
description: All allies recover 2 Mana per second. Stargazers recover extra 6 Mana per second.

name: Doomsworn
description: Summon a 1-star Hanabi to join the battle. Hanabi can wear Equipment.

name: Northern Vale
description: Northern Vale Heroes apply a Winter Mark when dealing DMG to enemies. Every 6 Winter Marks will detonate and deal 260 True DMG.

10.2: Rain continuous frost on enemies. The frost deals 2400 True DMG and stacks winter marks.

name: Dragon Altar
description: Generate 4 special tiles on the battlefield. Heroes on these tiles gain 8% DMG Increase and 8 Hybrid DEF, with Dragon Altar Heroes receiving 3 times the bonus.

10.4: Additionally, a dragon descends at the start of battle, dealing True DMG equal to 50% of enemies' HP and stunning them for 3s.

name: Emberlord
description: When an Emberlord Hero dies, 20% of their HP and 30% of their Hybrid ATK will be evenly shared among surviving Emberlord Heroes.

10.3: When an Emberlord Hero dies, they will resurrect and restore 30% HP.

name: Astro Power
description: Astro Power Heroes gain 10% DMG Increase. The Astro Power Hero with the most Equipment becomes the Astro Sovereign and gains an additional 20% DMG Increase and 5% Hybrid Lifesteal.

10.4: Create an additional Astro Sovereign, and Astro Soverigns gain an additional 25% Max HP.

name: Eruditio
description: Get a vault that can be opened once per match. Accumulate Knowledge Points based on battle results and open the vault to receive a piece of exclusive Eruditio Equipment that provides 0% DMG increase and rewards based on the Points. Gain 1 Point(s) for win, 2 Point(s) for defeat.

10.4: Recover 2 commander HP each round. Instantly receive 99 Knowledge Points.

name: Dawnbringer
description: Obtain exclusive Dawnbringer Equipment that can grow stronger.

4.1: Obtain 1 additional piece(s) of Dawnbringer Equipment, each with 6 growth(s).

6.1: Obtain 1 more piece(s) of Dawnbringer Equipment, each with 12 growth(s).

10.1: Obtain an additional Supreme Crown. All Dawnbringer Equipment gains 24 growth(s).

name: Shadeweaver
description: When battle starts, a fierce wind sweeps across the battlefield from the last tile of each column containing a Shadeweaver Hero, granting 30% ATK Speed to allies and knocking enemies airborne for 1s.

name: Faeborn
description: Faeborn Heroes use vines to protect Heroes with Blessing effect, granting them 30% extra DMG and reducing DMG taken by 10%.

3.3: Another Synergy of the Hero with Blessing effect also gains a Blessing (Synergy Count +1).

name: Exorcist
description: Obtain Exorcist's Seal. When an Exorcist Hero dies, they transform into the Hero carrying the Exorcist's Seal, inherit all HP, and cast their skill once before disappearing.

2.1: Obtain Exorcist's Seal (Basic). When an Exorcist Hero dies, they deal 80%/90%/110% Skill DMG of the Hero they transformed into based on their own Star level.

4.1: Obtain Exorcist's Seal (Advanced). When an Exorcist Hero dies, they deal 90%/100%/120% Skill DMG of the Hero they transformed into based on their own Star level.
